convertToParameters.description: If set to true, allure-specflow converts a step table data to step parameters.

paramNameRegex.description: If convertToParameters is true, allure-specflow checks if the first column header of a step table matches this regular expression. If it's not, the table is skipped.'

paramValueRegex.description: If convertToParameters is true, allure-specflow checks if the second column header of a step table matches this regular expression. If it's not, the table is skipped.'

parentSuite.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the parentSuite label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as parentSuite. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

suite.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the suite label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as suite. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

subSuite.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the subSuite label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as subSuite. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

epic.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the epic label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as epic. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

story.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the story label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as story. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

package.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the package label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as package. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

testClass.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the testClass label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as testClass. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

testMethod.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the testMethod label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as testMethod. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

severity.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the severity label. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as severity. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

label.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to the specified label. You must define two capture groups in the expression. The first one is used to match a name of the label, while the second one is used to match a value.

link.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to a link. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as a link's value. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

issue.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to an issue link. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as a link's value. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.

tms.description: If a gherkin tag matches this regular expression, it's converted to a TMS item link. If there is a capture group defined, only the part matching this group is used as a link's value. Otherwise, the whole tag is used.
